scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.prod:build: npm run prod:build --prefix backend && npm run prod:build --prefix frontend
scripts.prod:start: concurrently "npm run prod:start --prefix backend" "npm run prod:start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
